synopsis.text: This thrilling anime unfolds in the futuristic landscape of Mega-Tokyo, 2040, where a catastrophic earthquake has been overshadowed by the advent of Boomers, humanoid robots engineered by the powerful corporation, Genom. These Boomers, designed to aid in reconstruction and serve as a labor force, face societal prejudice and occasionally malfunction, wreaking havoc on the city. Amidst this chaos, a group of courageous women, known as the Knight Sabers, emerge as the city's unofficial protectors. Equipped with state-of-the-art power suits, they confront the rogue Boomers, challenging the corporation's influence and safeguarding the citizens of Mega-Tokyo. Lina Yamazaki, a newcomer to the city, seeks employment while aspiring to join the Knight Sabers in their relentless battle against the unpredictable Boomers.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
